entry.title: Concealer + Ph Blush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Concealer
Price: 1599.00

Late nights, flawless mornings – meet the Hangover Proof Full Coverage Concealer.

This light-as-air, full-coverage concealer hides dark circles, blemishes, redness, and signs of last night – no creasing, no caking.

Why it's a game-changer:

Full coverage with a natural matte finish

Sweat-proof, water-resistant & crease-proof

Shea Butter-infused for hydration & smooth application

Blurs fine lines, pores & wrinkles effortlessly

XL pillowy doe-foot for easy, precise use

Doubles as a highlighter & contour stick

9 versatile shades made for Indian skin tones

Made in Korea


Say hello to glow – Typsy Beauty’s pH-antastic Colour Adjusting Blush!

India’s first-ever powder tint blush that adapts to your unique pH and moisture levels for a personalized pop of color that lasts up to 8 hours.

Why it’s a must-have:

pH-Adaptive Formula: Custom blush shade tailored to your skin

Powder Tint Tech: Long-wear, vibrant color with a radiant finish

Featherlight Texture: Breathable, zero-powder feel

Easy to Blend: Seamless, natural glow without harsh lines

Brightening Pigments: Instantly freshens your complexion

Oil Control + Hydration: Matte finish with skin-loving comfort

Universal. Weightless. Glow-boosting. Your cheeks, but better.

entry.title: Concealer + Lip Treatment Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Concealer
Price: 1499.00

Late nights, flawless mornings – meet the Hangover Proof Full Coverage Concealer.

This light-as-air, full-coverage concealer hides dark circles, blemishes, redness, and signs of last night – no creasing, no caking.

Why it's a game-changer:

Full coverage with a natural matte finish

Sweat-proof, water-resistant & crease-proof

Shea Butter-infused for hydration & smooth application

Blurs fine lines, pores & wrinkles effortlessly

XL pillowy doe-foot for easy, precise use

Doubles as a highlighter & contour stick

9 versatile shades made for Indian skin tones

Made in Korea


Meet the Pout Polish Peptide Lip Treatment Balm – where skincare meets makeup.

This all-in-one balm delivers the hydration of a lip mask, shine of a glaze, and nourishment of a treatment – all in a sleek, pocket-sized tube.

Why you’ll love it:

Peptides + Collagen: Smooth fine lines, plump, and brighten dark lips

8-Hour Hydration: Moisture-lock tech keeps lips soft and dewy

Cooling Metal Tip: Refreshing, mess-free application

Non-sticky Glaze: High-shine finish with zero tackiness

Lightweight & Buildable: Wears like a dream, day or night

Dessert-Inspired Scents: A treat for your lips

Made in Italy. 100% vegan & cruelty-free. For everyone, every day

entry.title: Hangover Proof Concealer + Dip & Dab Blender
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Concealer
Price: 1529.00

A combo containing any shade of the Hangover Proof Concealer + the Dip & Dab Blender

Hangover Proof Concealer: This concealer boasts a long-wear, sweat, and crease-proof formula that provides light-as-air, full coverage. It masterfully hides under-eye circles, acne scars, blemishes, fine lines, pores, and wrinkles, while also reducing redness. Enriched with Shea butter, it ensures your look remains flawless all day, without creasing or settling into fine lines or pores. This concealer stands as your resilient beauty ally, promising to keep your appearance impeccable, no matter how the night went.

Specially formulated to flatter Indian skin tones, it comes available in 9 versatile shades and doubles as a fantastic tool for highlighting and contouring.

Dip & Dab Blender: Elevate your makeup game to a flawless, celebrity-like finish in seconds with the Dip & Dab beauty blender. This innovative makeup beauty blender offers the best of both worlds through its dual texture design; featuring a unique foam on one side for blending and a silicone surface on the other for application. Plus, its flat side is meticulously engineered to contour to the unique angles and curves of your face seamlessly.

Dip: Use the silicone side of this beauty blender sponge to apply liquids and creams effortlessly. Thanks to its non-porous nature, it ensures minimal product wastage by preventing absorption unlike regular foam blenders, delivering higher coverage.

Dab: When you’re ready to blend, flip over to the sponge side to achieve a seamless and airbrushed finish. The soft, mini beauty blender texture is perfect for tapping your way to that desired flawless finish.

entry.title: Hangover Proof Full Coverage Concealer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Concealer
Price: 990.00

Morning afters should never dampen your glow. Whether you're looking to disguise under-eye bags, blemishes, redness, or signs of the previous night's escapades, keep your secret concealed with the Hangover Proof Full Coverage Concealer.

This full coverage concealer boasts a long-wear, sweat, and crease-proof formula that provides  light-as-air, full coverage. It masterfully hides under-eye circles, acne scars, blemishes, fine lines, pores, and wrinkles, while also reducing redness. Enriched with Shea butter, it ensures your look remains flawless all day, without creasing or settling into fine lines or pores. This concealer stands as your resilient beauty ally, promising to keep your appearance impeccable, no matter how the night went.

Whether you need a full-coverage concealer for mature skin, a water-based formula, or the best option for oily or dry skin, the Hangover Proof Concealer has you covered. Its hydrating formula makes it perfect for dry skin, while its versatility shines as an ideal concealer stick. Embrace flawless skin every day with this exceptional multitasker.

Specially formulated to flatter Indian skin tones, it comes available in 9 versatile shades and doubles as a fantastic tool for highlighting and contouring.

Why is it special:

• Full-coverage formula with natural matte finish
• Infused with Shea Butter
• Sweat, water resistant and crease-proof formula that won't cake or settle
• Helps smooth & blur appearance of fine lines, pores & wrinkles
• Applies easily with XL pillowy soft doe-foot applicator
• Made in Korea

100% vegan & cruelty-free
